createGame(string,address).details: Create a new game with a wager

params._gameId: The unique identifier for the game
params._opponent: Optional opponent address (can be address(0) for open games)

emergencyWithdraw().details: Emergency function to withdraw all funds (only owner)

returns._0: uint256 The total ETH held by the contract

params._gameId: The unique identifier for the game

returns._0: Game struct containing all game information

isGameReadyToSettle(string).details: Check if a game is ready to be settled

params._gameId: The unique identifier for the game

returns._0: bool True if both players have paid and game is not settled

params._gameId: The unique identifier for the game

settleGame(string,address).details: Settle a game and distribute winnings

params._gameId: The unique identifier for the game

createGame(string,address).notice: The caller must send exactly the wager amount as msg.value

emergencyWithdraw().notice: This should only be used in extreme circumstances

joinGame(string).notice: The caller must send exactly the wager amount as msg.value

settleGame(string,address).notice: Only the settler can call this function

updateSettler(address).notice: Only the owner can call this function

withdrawPending().notice: Allows users to withdraw funds that couldn't be transferred during settlement
